alert.note: Alert for Mahoning (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 2:09PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Mahoning County through 245 PM EDT... At 208 PM EDT, the public reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Campbell to Leetonia. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Public reported penny size hail in Boardman around 2 PM. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Youngstown, Salem, Columbiana, Boardman, Campbell, Canfield, Austintown, Struthers, Poland, New Middletown, Lowellville, Greenford and Mineral Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
